mapper.select: SELECT w.work_name workName , DATE_FORMAT(w.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') createDate , w.admin_email adminEmail , wm.work_member_name workMemberName FROM workspace w INNER JOIN workspace_member wm ON w.work_no = wm.work_no AND w.admin_email = wm.work_member_email WHERE w.work_no = #{workNo}

SELECT w.work_member_no workMemberNo , w.work_member_name workMemberName , w.work_member_pos workMemberPos , w.work_member_email workMemberEmail , v.filename , v.file_ext fileExt FROM workspace_member w INNER JOIN v_workspace_member v ON w.work_member_no = v.work_member_no WHERE w.work_no = #{workMemberNo} AND active = 'Y'

SELECT count(*) taskCnt , round(count(task_end) / count(*) * 100, 1) taskComplete FROM task_list tl INNER JOIN task t ON t.tasklist_no = tl.tasklist_no INNER JOIN project p ON tl.project_no = p.project_no WHERE p.work_no = #{workNo}

SELECT t.task_point taskPoint , COUNT(IFNULL(0, task_point)) taskPointCnt FROM task_list tl INNER JOIN task t ON t.tasklist_no = tl.tasklist_no INNER JOIN project p ON tl.project_no = p.project_no WHERE p.work_no = #{workNo} GROUP BY t.task_point

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(task_end, '%Y-%m-%d') date , COUNT(task_end) taskCnt FROM task_list tl INNER JOIN task t ON t.tasklist_no = tl.tasklist_no INNER JOIN project p ON tl.project_no = p.project_no WHERE p.work_no = 6 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(task_end, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY task_end DESC;
